detail_desc: Hair claws in metal and plastic. Size 3.5 cm.

Ankle-length boiler suit in washed denim with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, and side and back pockets. Waist with elastication at the back and a detachable D-ring belt, and wide, tapered legs with a decorative seam at the back of the hems.
Court shoes in imitation suede with rounded toes and covered block heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Court shoes in imitation suede with rounded toes and covered block heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6.5 cm.

Short dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening with a concealed button at the front and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist, a decorative belt with a metal buckle, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening with a concealed button at the front and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist, a decorative belt with a metal buckle, and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Short dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening with a concealed button at the front and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist, a decorative belt with a metal buckle, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Shorts in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication, and diagonal side pockets.
Shorts in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication, and diagonal side pockets.

Jacket with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and patch front pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Jacket with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud and patch front pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a square neckline front and back. Short, voluminous puff sleeves in a viscose and cotton weave with narrow elastication at the hems and shoulders.
Short-sleeved body in stretch viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back decorated with a wide flounce, and press-studs at the crotch.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front, press-studs at the back of one shoulder and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front, press-studs at the back of one shoulder and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front, press-studs at the back of one shoulder and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short, wide dress in crinkled chiffon with a grandad collar and button placket. Long sleeves with a button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Lined with a short, V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Round neckline with a V-shaped opening and decorative bar-shaped bead at the back, an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, and a laser-cut hem. Unlined.

Short dress in imitation leather with a collar and press-studs down the front. Voluminous puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, a gently tapered waist with a seam, and a flared skirt. Brushed inside.
Calf-length trousers in an airy rib knit. High waist with covered elastication and wide, straight legs.
All-in-one suit in soft fleece. Hood with appliqués and embroidery, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and jersey ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Unlined.
All-in-one suit in soft fleece. Hood with appliqués and embroidery, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and jersey ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Unlined.
Shirt in a crisp cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam under the bust for added width.
Leotard in soft jersey with long sleeves and a tulle skirt. Press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Leotard in soft jersey with long sleeves and a tulle skirt. Press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.

Short, straight-cut coat in woven fabric with notch lapels and buttons at the front. One chest pocket, flap welt front pockets, dropped shoulders, decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and short puff sleeves with smocked hems. Covered buttons down the front and a gathered seam under the bust that is elasticated at the back. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and short puff sleeves with smocked hems. Covered buttons down the front and a gathered seam under the bust that is elasticated at the back. Unlined.

Blouse in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a square neckline front and back and decorative button placket. Smocked section at the back, short puff sleeves that are elasticated at the top and hems, and a gathered seam under the bust. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with flutter sleeves. V-neck, buttons at the top, a tie belt under the bust and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Blouse woven in a cotton blend with a sewn-in wrapover front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Sewn-on tie belt at the waist and a flared peplum.
Blouse woven in a cotton blend with a sewn-in wrapover front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication. Sewn-on tie belt at the waist and a flared peplum.
Elasticated satin scrunchie with a scarf detail.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist and fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets, pleats at the top, and tapered legs.

Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey. Two in a solid colour and three with print motifs.

Top in supersoft jersey with a brushed finish. Long, wide puff sleeves and trims around the neckline and cuffs.

Metal rings in various designs, some decorated with sparkly stones.
Bomber jacket with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard and heart-shaped pull. Discreet pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Knee-length jersey crêpe dress with a V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps, a detachable tie belt at the waist and softly draping A-line skirt. Lined bodice.
Long jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and flap welt front pockets. Lined.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems.
Open jacket in airy, crinkled viscose with low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves.

Oversized jacket in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the sides. Unlined. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Short, straight-cut dress in washed cotton denim with a zip at the back, elbow-length puff sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button.

Set with three T-shirts and two pairs of trousers in cotton jersey and a top and pair of shorts in cotton sweatshirt fabric. T-shirts with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a round, ribbed neckline. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Top with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, press-studs at the back of one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey.
T-shirts in soft,organic cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the hips. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the hips. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a patterned weave. Square neckline with decorative gathers at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Short puff sleeves with smocked hems, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a slit at the front. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a round neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck and long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the waist and a gathered tier for added width. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a round neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck and long raglan balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Relaxed fit with a gathered seam at the waist and a gathered tier for added width. Unlined.

Long dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a deep V-neck that has a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the bottom. Gathers at the shoulders for a gentle draping effect, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication at the waist, and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
